data.eml:eml: New and revised species of the aulacopleurid trilobite Maurotarion from the Lower Devonian (Pragian) of Nevada

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Adrain, Jonathan M. (2009): New and revised species of the aulacopleurid trilobite Maurotarion from the Lower Devonian (Pragian) of Nevada. Zootaxa 2215: 1-23, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.189946
